contact.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.1.question: How do I place a custom cake order?
faq.1.answer: Browse products, select a cake, customize it and proceed with Chapa pre-payment.
faq.2.question: How is the platform commission handled?
faq.2.answer: A percentage platform commission is deducted automatically during Chapa payment.
faq.3.question: I am a Bakery Owner, how do I register?
faq.3.answer: Go to register page, select Bakery Owner role and submit business details for verification.
faq.4.question: What if I need to cancel an order?
faq.4.answer: Cancellation depends on order status. If not accepted, cancel directly; if accepted, contact support.
